items.text:
Kordo roars out a welcome when he sees you. “The great hunters
return! Good to see you. Just a moment, and I’ll grab a bottle of the
good stuff.”

You spend an enjoyable few hours chatting with Kordo. When it’s time
for you to leave, he hugs you and looks a bit sad to see you go. “Glad
you came by, fellows. You know, we should go hunting again ‘fore too
long, right? I know plenty of tales of more elusive prey than that
northern ghost.”
